products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash solar yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The bold yellow roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2056 Fabric Colour: Solar Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout sunburst yellow fabric is a stunning, bright but subtle shade of yellow, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors. This shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades but will also compliment natural wooden tones. A real all rounder. 
 
Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.  
 
This child-safe, electric roller blind can be upgrade for use with smart phones, Amazon Alexa and Google Home Hub devices.  At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this Electric Roller Blind made by our expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year gurarantee!
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2210 Fabric Colour: Sunburst Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This bright sunny yellow electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our electric rollers are great for privacy and light control.  As there is no need for a cord with this blind, this makes our electric roller blinds inherently child-safe! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This yellow electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2057 Fabric Colour: Solar Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The warm, golden hues of this electric roller blind will definitely catch the eye! Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, it’s a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
